activities: Trifecta Multimedia, LLC provides online training for investigators and staff participating in clinical trials.  Trifecta collects only minimal personal information for each person participating in trials and does not collect any sensitive personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client and Customer information for people who are participating in clinical trials and are required to take on-line training or qualify for performing rating scales on clinical trials – On-line and Hard Copy
recoursemech: Trifecta Clinical has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panels established by the European data protection authorities (EU DPAs) and the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner of Switzerland (FDPIC) to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
